# Night Vision (Ex)
## Overview
*Night Vision (Ex)*: The barbarianâ€™s senses grow incredibly sharp while raging and she gains darkvision 60 feet. A barbarian must have low-light vision as a rage power or a racial trait to select this rage power.

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 33
